00126                 && (pts[i+2] > 0.0) &&

00130         tmpNodes.push_back( ot::TreeNode((unsigned int)(pts[i]*(double)(1u<<maxDepth)),
00131             (unsigned int)(pts[i+1]*(double)(1u<<maxDepth)),
00132             (unsigned int)(pts[i+2]*(double)(1u<<maxDepth)),

00140       nodes = tmpNodes;
00141       tmpNodes.clear();

00157         pts[(3*i)+1] = (((double)(nodes[i].getY())) +0.5)/((double)(1u<<maxDepth));
00158         pts[(3*i)+2] = (((double)(nodes[i].getZ())) +0.5)/((double)(1u<<maxDepth));
00159       }//end for i
00160       nodes.clear();
00161     }//end if readPts
00162     gSize[0] = 1.0;
00163     gSize[1] = 1.0;

00167         std::cout<<"Writing pts to: "<<p2nOut<<std::endl;

00176   PetscLogStagePush(stages[1]);
00177 #endif
00178     startTime = MPI_Wtime();

00180     endTime = MPI_Wtime();
00181 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00182   PetscLogStagePop();
00183 #endif
00184     double locTime, totalTime, minTime;
00185     locTime = endTime - startTime;
00186     par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&locTime, &totalTime, 1, MPI_MAX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00187     par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&locTime, &minTime, 1, MPI_MIN, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00188     if(!rank){
00189       std::cout <<"P2n Time: "<<totalTime << " " << "secs imbalance: "<< totalTime/minTime << std::endl;
00190     }
00191     pts.clear();

00194   if(runOpt == 0 || runOpt == 2) {
00195     if(readOctFile) {
00196       ot::readNodesFromFile(n2oOut,nodes);
00197     }
00198     std::vector<ot::TreeNode > linOct;  
00199 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00200   PetscLogStagePush(stages[2]);
00201 #endif
00202     DendroIntL inputNodes = nodes.size();
00203     DendroIntL totInp;
00204     par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&inputNodes, &totInp, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00205     if(!rank) {
00206       std::cout << "Nodes after p2o: "<< totInp  << std::endl;       
00207     }
00208     ot::completeOctree(nodes,linOct,dim,maxDepth,false, false, false, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00209 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00210   PetscLogStagePop();
00211 #endif
00212 
00213     assert(!linOct.empty());
00214     if(writeBOut) { 
00215       if(!rank) {
00216         std::cout<<"Writing octree after p2o to: "<<n2oOut<<std::endl; 
00217       }
00218       ot::writeNodesToFile(n2oOut,linOct);
00219     }
00220     inputNodes = linOct.size();
00221     nodes.clear();
00222     std::vector<ot::TreeNode > balOct;
00223 
00224     par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&inputNodes, &totInp, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00225     if(!rank) {
00226       std::cout << "Nodes before balancing: "<< totInp  << std::endl;       
00227     }
00228     MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);        
00229 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00230   PetscLogStagePush(stages[3]);
00231 #endif
00232     startTime = MPI_Wtime();
00233 
00234     ot::balanceOctree (linOct, balOct, dim, maxDepth, incCorner, MPI_COMM_WORLD, NULL, NULL);
00235     endTime = MPI_Wtime();
00236 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00237   PetscLogStagePop();
00238 #endif
00239     assert(!balOct.empty());
00240     if(writeBOut) { 
00241       if(!rank) {
00242         std::cout<<"Writing octree after balancing to: "<<balOut<<std::endl; 
00243       }
00244       ot::writeNodesToFile(balOut,balOct);
00245     }
00246     // compute total inp size and output size
00247     DendroIntL locBalNodes = balOct.size();
00248     DendroIntL totBal;
00249     double balTime, totTime;
00250     balTime = endTime - startTime;
00251     par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locBalNodes, &totBal, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00252     par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&balTime, &totTime, 1, MPI_MAX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00253     par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&balTime, &minTime, 1, MPI_MIN, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00254 
00255     if(!rank) {

00258     }
